headline: Invisible person spotted out walking dog after curfew imposed on invisible people

headline: Where mixed messages matter the most and stop reading this already

headline: New toffee white and dark chocolate magnum gets the deep freeze from customers.

headline: Circus valour as clowns rescue lions and bears in Transylvania

headline: Students attending ivy league colleges will soon be banned from sharpening pencils according to new academic guidelines.
Mars water turns to sand on second sighting
lead: Document your medication and vitamins with this handy web app. Using Service Worker API for fast caching and App store free installation. This web app can be saved to your phone's homescreen for quick access and native app like features/user experience. Includes a handy modal with helpful hints.

headline: Male pattern baldness, the fifth circle of hell
